name: Singapore Health and Biomedical Congress
content: Singapore Health & Biomedical Congress will invite distinguished local and overseas speakers to discuss the 3 Beyonds vision for Singapore healthcare - Beyong Quality to Value, Beyond the Hospital to the Community and Beyond Healthcare to Health. International Expert Keynote Speakers will share their expertise and world-class knowledge on current healthcare problems and deliberate over potential solutions that will enable us to provide value in line with NHG's vision - Adding Years of Healthy Life to the population that we serve.
